snippet.title: Pico Topia - Upcoming Relaxing Citybuilder
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2648420/Pico_Topia/

Tired of city building where you have to micromanage everything?
Pico Topia is a simple and relaxing citybuilder where you build tiny buildings and collect resources until you run out of space!
Place your buildings and generate resources by combining them with other buildings. But watch out! Some buildings will also generate resource demands!
You can see your resource demand on the top of your screen. If there is too much demand, the game ends!
However, you can generate resources to fight the demand simply by either placing islands or combining them with other islands you already placed.
Each generated resource will also give you points used for leveling up and unlocking new buildings and resource types!
